FROM phusion/baseimage:0.11

CMD ["/sbin/my_init"]
WORKDIR /reddit-karma-bot
SHELL ["/bin/bash", "-c"]

RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
      g++ \
      gcc \
      golang-go \
      libc6-dev \
      make \
      pkg-config \
      wget \
      tmux \
      python2.7 \
      python-pip \
      python-setuptools \
      python-dev \
      git \
      ca-certificates && \
    apt-get clean && \
    rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/*

### set up bot
ADD ./src/requirements.txt requirements.txt
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir wheel
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir --upgrade pip wheel -r requirements.txt
COPY ./src /reddit-karma-bot-src

# run it
ENTRYPOINT [ "/bin/bash" ]
CMD [ "/reddit-karma-bot-src/run.sh" ]
